sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { chefOfTheWeek } from '../../../interfaces/Chef' import { ChefDescription, ChefName, DesktopChefDetails, DesktopPicNameDiv, PicName, RestaurantDiv, RestaurantImg, RestaurantName, TitleC, TitlePP } from './StyleChefDetails' export default function DesktopChefOfTheWeek() { return (
CHEF OF THE WEEK : {chefOfTheWeek.name}

{chefOfTheWeek.Description}
POPULAR RESTAURANTS IN EPICURE: {chefOfTheWeek.restaurants.slice(0,3).map((restaurant)=>( {restaurant.name} ))}
) }
